name: Jellyverse
description: Jellyverse is a comprehensive ecosystem in the decentralized finance (DeFi) sector, overseen by its community through a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO). It focuses on the next iteration of DeFi—commonly termed as DeFi 3.0—which aims to create a sustainable, yield-oriented landscape that integrates protocols with real-world price feeds. The platform provides several utilities designed to meet a variety of financial needs, all governed by its native token, JLY.
